messages.title: THEY LIED!
messages.content: Labour, Tories and Lib Dems all promised the British people a say on the EU... now they've changed their minds and refuse us this right.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union
keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP demands a referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union and highlights issues such as EU membership costing the UK £40 million a day, loss of control over laws and borders, and immigration.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP demands a referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union and mentions the cost and loss of control due to the EU.
issues.economy: EU membership costing the UK £40 million a day.
issues.governance: Laws made by the EU that govern our lives.
issues.immigration: Loss of border controls and immigration.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, Unit 1 King Charles Business Park, Old Newton Rd, Heathfield, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ12 6UT

images.caption: Campaign leaflet with the title 'THEY LIED!' highlighting UKIP's demand for a referendum on Britain's EU membership.
